quote: Very little is needed to make a happy life; it is all within yourself, in your way of thinking. – Marcus Aurelius
fact: Yo-yos were used as weapons by warriors in the Philippines in the 16th century.
joke: I never wanted to believe that my Dad was stealing from his job as a road worker. But when I got home, all the signs were there.
